seo_keywords: Shark Vertex cordless brush roll not spinning

problems.title: E4 Error / Brush Not Spinning
problems.description: Digital display shows 'E4' or nozzle nozzle light is red.
solution_steps: Check for blockages in the nozzle neck and wand.
Ensure the soft roller garage is latched shut.

problems.title: Battery Won't Charge / F1/F2 Error
problems.description: Vacuum won't turn on or display shows F codes.
solution_steps: Plug the charger directly into the battery (not the vacuum).
If it still doesn't charge, the lithium pack is dead.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a Vertex DuoClean PowerFins Cordless (IZ462H)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $341 vacuum, and extending the life of your Shark is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Vertex DuoClean PowerFins Cordless (IZ462H) needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include intermittent power and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my Vertex DuoClean PowerFins Cordless (IZ462H) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
